title: TikTok Overview
content: TikTok offers a personalized 'For You' feed driven by AI recommendations.

title: Guide to Hashtags
content: Use relevant and trending hashtags to increase visibility.

title: Tips for Safety
content: Enable two-factor authentication and filter comments.

title: How to Add Music
content: Click 'Sounds', browse library, and sync music with your video.

title: How to Upload a Video
content: Open TikTok, tap +, record or upload, edit with filters/effects, and post.

title: How to Duet
content: Find a video, tap 'Share', then select 'Duet' to record alongside it.

title: TikTok Overview
content: TikTok is a platform for creating and sharing short-form videos with music, filters, and effects.

title: TikTok Overview
content: TikTok allows users to discover trending content, participate in challenges, and follow creators.

title: Why is my video not uploading?
content: Check internet connection, update app, and clear cache.

title: How to Stitch
content: Tap 'Share' on a video, select 'Stitch', and record your own ending.

title: Tips for Editing
content: Experiment with transitions, speed effects, and text overlays.

title: How do I recover my account?
content: Use phone/email to reset password from login screen.

title: Guide to Analytics
content: Check your profile insights for engagement and audience data.

title: How to fix audio sync issues?
content: Restart the app, re-upload video, or update to the latest version.

title: Tips for Going Viral
content: Use trending sounds, hashtags, and engage with your audience.

title: Guide to Privacy Settings
content: Adjust who can comment, duet, or message you in settings.

title: Why can't I go live?
content: You need at least 1000 followers to unlock live streaming.
